system.description: Sentinel drones watch for aggressive enemy actions and move quickly to intervene. The precise appearance, manner of locomotion, and means of operation of a given class of sentinel drone may vary, but regardless they conform to one objective portfolio: deny the enemy and protect the master unit.
system.effect:
The sentinel drone can be deployed to any free space within Sensors and line of sight, where it establishes a burst 2 security perimeter. Hostile characters within the affected area take 3 kinetic damage from the droneâ€™s automatic fire before making any attack.
The sentinel drone can be redeployed to a new location or recalled as a quick action.
